name: resuspension
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of putting small pieces of solid material back into a gas or a liquid so that they hang or float there: The treated cells were washed twice by repeated centrifugation and resuspension. After centrifugation and resuspension, the cells were plated on coated dishes and grown for one week.
More examplesFewer examplesThe lymphocytes were washed by sedimentation and resuspension in fresh medium.The objective of the study is to test whether sediment resuspension may aid the cleaning process.Wind-induced currents play an important role in the Red Sea in initiating the process of re-suspension of bottom sediments.
